description: Derived from benzonitrile which contains the -C≡N group. Benzonitrile was discovered and named by by Hermann Fehling in 1844.

entries.meaning: (organic chemistry) any of a class of organic compounds containing a cyano functional group -C≡N; they are named as derivatives of the appropriate carboxylic acid.
A type of synthetic rubber formed by the copolymerisation of acrylonitrile and butadiene.
